content.en: mmWave optimization: Researchers are using algorithms to design and optimize various aspects of millimeter-wave (mmWave) communication systems. These algorithms are being used to develop hybrid beamforming and precoding techniques, which improve the performance and efficiency of multi-user massive MIMO systems over mmWave channels. By utilizing algorithms, researchers are able to design low-complexity hybrid precoders and beamformers, integrate mmWave with hybrid precoding for 5G communication, and optimize transceiver design in full-duplex multi-user massive MIMO systems.
